SqlVector.summary: Represents the vector datatype in SQL Server.

ctor1.summary: Takes a as input and initializes a new instance of the SqlVector class with length which represent vector value

ctor2.summary: Takes an array of values as input and initializes a new instance of the SqlVector class.

ElementCount.summary: Indicates the count of the elements in vector.

ElementName.summary: Indicates the name of the type of the elements in vector.

ElementSize.summary: Indicates the size in bytes for the type of the element in vector.

Values.summary: Represents array of elements contained in SqlVector.

RawBytes.summary: Represents array of elements as bytes.
